name: Spider Dance
description:
~ Join a spider in his journey through the night ~

This is a submission for XAMK Game Jam II under the theme "Art".

The theme was approached with the thought of creating something that gives an "experience/realization" like one has when visiting an art exhibition to view art, enjoy ;)

Team: Nobody here but us chickens

Emelli Nee -  programming, design, audio 

Ester Auroora  - art, design
